data.title: Where to start with Angela Carterâ€™s books
data.meta_description: With work spanning fiction, poetry, short stories and even books for children there is plenty to discover in Angela Carter pioneering work. To celebrate the release of a new radio drama collection from the BBC, we explore the life and work of this seminal author.
data.text: With work spanning fiction, poetry, short stories and even books for children there is plenty to discover in Angela Carter pioneering work. To celebrate the release of a new radio drama collection from the BBC, we explore the life and work of this seminal author.
